usage_example.python:

client = OpenAI()

    model="gpt-4o",
    max_tokens=4096,
    messages=[
        {"role": "system", "content": """I would like you to act as an SVG designer. I will ask you to create images, and you will come up wi..."""},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
